entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 5:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -23.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
